graph_title: Number of participants joining projects/programs on sustainability
indicator_name: Number of participants joining projects/programs on sustainability

related_targets.name: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

SDG_GOAL: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all
SDG_INDICATOR: Number of participants joining projects/programs on sustainability
